TITLE: War, diplomacy, or revolt: What comes next in Iran?

Major advances in power conservation, like LED lightbulbs and more efficient heating and air conditioning, kept a lid on electricity use. That helped hold down rates because Oregon’s utilities could make do with the power they had.

The state’s population growth stalled after the pandemic. Oregon’s job market flatlined a
KEYWORDS: electricity oregon, oregon electricity, oregon energy, oregon power, demand oregon
